titles.title: Consumer Cellphone Number Distribution Protection Act of 2009
Consumer Cellphone Number Distribution Protection Act of 2009
To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit certain disclosures of cell phone numbers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: Consumer Cellphone Number Distribution Protection Act of 2009 - Amends the federal criminal code to impose a fine and/or prison term of up to six months for knowingly disclosing a wireless subscriber's unlisted cell phone number to another, for gain, without the express permission of such subscriber.
